meanings.sent1: The adulterator mixed the ingredients incorrectly.
meanings.sent2: The adulterator added fake spices to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The adulterator accidentally put salt instead of sugar in the cake.
meanings.sent4: She was a sneaky adulterator, altering the documents without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent5: The adulterator's actions tainted the purity of the product.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to adulterate something.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen adulterator was used to dilute the drink.
meanings.sent2: The chemical adulterator altered the test results.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky adulterator tool made the painting look older than it was.
meanings.sent4: The adulterator device transformed the original flavor of the food.
meanings.sent5: The adulterator's impact was evident in the final product.
